content:
in holland they have two national "nobels":

  • Spinoza Award for theory
  • Simon Stevin Award for applied sciences
    Ieke Moerdijk won a "Spinoza" i think in 2017.
    Bart Jacobs just won a "Simon Stevin"!!
    https://bits-chips.nl/artikel/nijmegen-security-professor-bart-jacobs-wins-stevin-prize/
Good for him!! His monograph on Categorical Logic and Type Theory is truly one of my favorite books. It is a shame that he has left logic, great loss to the discipline.
